skills.name: SHOUT
desc: • Damage increases the lower the target’s CURRENT HP.

skills.name: FEVER
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 40% Chance to Heal Block the enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: MEMENTO
desc: Shatters upon death, applying 4 Marks to all enemies. Marks can be consumed with Perfect Hits to deal true damage.
